## updateExpositionValues() function

Update the values of the given `Expostion`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function updateExpositionValues<TExposition extends Exposition<any>, TValues extends ExpositionValues<TExposition>>(exposition: TExposition, values: Partial<TValues>): TExposition;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  exposition | TExposition |  |
|  values | Partial&lt;TValues&gt; | that will be used to update the given <code>Exposition</code> values |

<b>Returns:</b>

TExposition

`Exposition`

## Example

const exposition = createExposition(<!-- -->{ autobot: { options: \['Optimus Prime ğŸšš', 'Bumblebee ğŸš—'\] }<!-- -->, decepticon: { options: \['Megatron âœˆï¸', 'Starscream ğŸ›©ï¸'\] }<!-- -->, } as const)

const updatedExposition = updateExpositionValues(exposition, { autobot: 'Bumblebee ğŸš—' }<!-- -->)

getExpositionValues(updatedExposition) // { autobot: 'Bumblebee ğŸš—', decepticon: 'Megatron âœˆï¸' }
